optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#cookieConsentBanner > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(3):not([id]) > div:nth-child(1):not([id]) > button#cookieConsentRefuseButton

test.waitForVisible: body > div#cookieConsentBanner > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(3):not([id]) > div:nth-child(1):not([id]) > button#cookieConsentRefuseButton
